Job Posting: 176089 - Position: S26 2026 CFO, Summer Data Enablement Co-op (8 months) 176089 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/06/2026 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 12/16/2025 10:02 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country RBC (Royal Bank of Canada) Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 2026 CFO, Summer Data Enablement Co-op (8 months) 176089 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description What is the Opportunity? Salary Not Available, 0 Major List This is an exciting opportunity in the COO, CFO Group where you will play an instrumental role in coordinating the development of various automation solutions and web-based applications by leveraging RBC's big data assets. This role will work with various stakeholders in helping to identify business problems and prioritize them to unlock business value. Our team consists of highly accomplished professionals with various backgrounds in computer science, data, Business analytics, accounting and finance to deliver innovative solutions that supports data-driven decisions. What will you do? • Play a central oversight and collaboration role across teams within the various Finance departments across the bank. This includes providing detailed data and analysis that will help other teams within the group enhance and transform their existing reporting processes and dialogue with key stakeholders. • Apply design thinking and an agile mindset in working with business stakeholders to continuously experiment, iterate and deliver on new initiatives. • Support data management processes - acquiring, transforming and storing massive volume of structured and unstructured data. Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and develop and manage relationship with relevant stakeholders • Job Requirements Must-have • Excellent problem solving and proven analytical skills, with a high degree of initiative • Basic knowledge of programming in Python and SQL. • Experience with data extraction, transformation, and loading from a wide variety of data sources. • Ability to work under pressure and demonstrate multi-tasking skill • Advance knowledge of MS Excel and PowerPoint • Excellent oral and written communication skills Nice-to-have • Experience with Business Intelligence Reporting & visualizations using Tableau or similar products • Experience with Capital Markets, Personal & Commercial Banking, Wealth Management products and businesses Experience in RBC Finance/Risk's big data projects. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://jobs.rbc.com/ca/en/job/R-0000152130/2026-CFO-Summer-Data- Enablement-Co-op-8-months Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
